DataElement.preferredName: Biospecimen Blood Collection Laboratory Ambient Humidity Percentage Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The humidity inside the laboratory when the when blood specimens were received expressed as a percentage of water vapor in the air.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Biospecimen Blood Collection Laboratory Ambient Humidity
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._A liquid tissue; its major function is to transport oxygen throughout the body. It also supplies the tissues with nutrients, removes waste products, and contains various components of the immune system defending the body against infection. Several hormones also travel in the blood._The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place._A facility equipped and competent to conduct scientific experiments, observations, tests, investigations, and/or to manufacture chemicals or medical products._In or of the immediately surrounding area; relating to the immediate surroundings of something._A measure of the water vapor content of air.
